Yes,  I have and find it to be very nice.  You can launch tests directly 
from the IDE, run tests through the debugger if you so desire, etc.  The 
web site doesn't seem to have much detailed information, but the best way 
to find out about it would be to try it yourself with the free download.

http://www.intellij.com/idea/download.jsp

This is not a plug.  I just like the software ;-)

At 06:21 AM 3/25/2002 +0000, you wrote:
>Hi All,
>
